description:
Blender 4.4 open-source 3D graphics creation software is now available for download with new features and numerous improvements. Here’s what’s new!

The post Blender 4.4 Released with a Big Update for the Experimental Vulkan Backend appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Blender 4.4 Released with a Big Update for the Experimental Vulkan Backend

description:
Fedora Linux 42 distribution is now available for public beta testing powered by Linux kernel 6.14 and featuring the GNOME 48 desktop environment. Here’s what to expect from the final release.

The post Fedora Linux 42 Enters Public Beta Testing with Linux Kernel 6.14 and GNOME 48 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Fedora Linux 42 Enters Public Beta Testing with Linux Kernel 6.14 and GNOME 48
